channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Shudder to Think Announce First Tour Since 2008
item.description: 🎸 Shake things up with Shudder to Think hitting the road after 13 years! Rock on! 🤘 #ShudderToThink #TourAnnouncement

item.title: Brandon Blackstock’s Daughter Pens Emotional Tribute to Her Father: ‘Lost a Piece of My Heart’
item.description: 🎶 Family love shines through music! 💕 Brandon Blackstock's daughter shares a touching tribute 🎵 #HeartfeltMelodies #MusicFamilyLove

item.title: Paz Lenchantin Announces Debut Solo Album, Shares Video for New Song “Hang Tough”: Watch
item.description: Paz Lenchantin is bringing the 🔥 with her debut solo album! 🎶 Check out her new video for “Hang Tough” now! 💃 #NewMusicAlert

item.title: FKA Twigs Announces New Album EUSEXUA Afterglow, Which Is Not A Deluxe
item.description: 🎉 FKA Twigs drops the news bomb: new album ‘EUSEXUA Afterglow’ is coming and it’s not just a deluxe edition! 🔥 #FKATwigs #NewMusicAlert

item.title: Belle And Sebastian Announce 30th Anniversary Tigermilk & If You’re Feeling Sinister Tour
item.description: 🐯✨ Celebrate 30 years of indie magic with Belle and Sebastian on their upcoming tour! Who's ready to dance? 🎶 #BelleandSebastian #IndieLegends
